comment: The best professor I had. He is very patience and clearly communicates complex subjects such that every one understands. The class had project that was very interesting in covering course materials and beyond. He shares practical aspects of the lectures he experienced while in industry and this has much added value, overall very pleased with him!
Very approachable and caring about our success! Enjoyed his lectures and would take him again!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Amazing lectures

comment: His lecture class is not difficult. Homework for every chapter about 4-5 problems and tests are open book open note but he requires lockdown browser? His lab however suffice to say frustrating. Grades the lab reports harshly. He gives zero instructions + there is no rubric for the reports + grades based on if he likes you as a student
